name: BudgetBear
description: BudgetBear is a free budgeting and finance tracking app designed to help you manage your money.

features.title: Expense Tracking
features.desc: Easily track your daily expenses and categorize them for better insights.

features.title: Budget Planning
features.desc: Set monthly budgets and monitor your spending to stay on track.

features.title: Financial Reports
features.desc: Generate detailed reports to analyze your financial habits and make informed decisions.

features.title: iCloud Sync
features.desc: Sync your data across all your Apple devices securely using iCloud.

name: MyMenu
description: MyMenu is a free meal planning app designed to help you organise your weekly meals and shopping with ease, saving you money and reducing on food waste.

features.title: Weekly Meal Planning
features.desc: Plan your meals for the week ahead with our easy-to-use calendar interface.

features.title: Automated Shopping Lists
features.desc: Generate shopping lists based on your meal plans to make grocery shopping a breeze.

features.title: Meal Suggestions
features.desc: Get meal suggestions based on your dietary preferences and past meals.

features.title: Favourite Meals
features.desc: Save your favourite meals for quick access and easy planning in the future.

name: TodayOS
description: The all-in-one productivity suite that adapts to your workflow. Schedule, track, organize, and achieve more.

features.title: Smart Scheduling
features.desc: Intuitive drag-and-drop calendar with time blocking to help you organize your day effectively.

features.title: Reflective Journal
features.desc: Daily journaling with guided prompts and mood tracking to help you grow and stay mindful.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.desc: Build lasting habits with visual progress tracking and intelligent reminders that adapt to your lifestyle.

features.title: Task Management
features.desc: Organize your to-dos with priority levels, deadlines, and reminders on a per-project basis to keep you on track.

features.title: Visual Kanban
features.desc: Drag and drop tasks across customizable boards to visualize your workflow and boost productivity.

features.title: Notes
features.desc: Rich text editing with linking, tagging, and search. Your thoughts, organized and accessible.

features.title: Spaces
features.desc: Create dedicated workspaces to organize related projects, tasks, notes, and schedules in one place.

name: Whirlwind
description: Tailwind Play as a native desktop app, with offline support, project management, local saving, and more.

features.title: Offline Support
features.desc: Work on your TailwindCSS projects without an internet connection.

features.title: Project Management
features.desc: Easily manage multiple TailwindCSS projects within the app.

features.title: Local Saving
features.desc: Save your projects locally on your device for quick access and security.

features.title: Color Picker
features.desc: Quickly select tailwind colors from a built-in color picker tool.

features.title: Gradient Generator
features.desc: Generate and customize gradients for your TailwindCSS projects with ease.

features.title: Monaco editor
features.desc: VS Code editor with syntax highlighting, autocompletion, and error checking for a seamless coding experience.
